channel.title: [pi] improving run.bat [pi]
channel.description: hello, i would like to improve my run.bat, i would like to know if i would be able to remodel per say like no-ip. for those who run a server you would know that when you run no-ip you are able to close it and it will still be open in your tools tab next to msn, clock ect. i would like to know if i can do this with my source run so i don't haft to have it open on desk top tool bar. if this is possible can you please help me. if not please say so. thankyou.

item.title: [pi] improving run.bat [pi]
item.dc:creator: @s_w_3_3_t1 s w 3 3 t1
item.description:
@s_w_3_3_t1 wrote:

yes, lke that
if you have no-ip when you open it you can close it and it will still stay open but it will go into your tools.
and you can go to your tools and right click to open it.

so yeah i wont the same as no-ip so i can close it and do other things without having it on my opened documents so it will be in my tools.
thankyou for posting back
